greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in expansion of -q*E'_4/E_4 where E_4 is the Eisenstein Series (A004009).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..422
mathematica: nmax = 20; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[-240*x*Sum[k*DivisorSigma[3, k]*x^(k-1), {k, 1, nmax}]/(1 + 240*Sum[DivisorSigma[3, k]*x^k, {k, 1, nmax}]), {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 09 2017 *)
terms = 12; Ei[n_] = 1-(2n/BernoulliB[n]) Sum[k^(n-1) x^k/(1-x^k), {k, terms}]; CoefficientList[-D[Ei[4], x]/Ei[4] + O[x]^terms, x] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 01 2018 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 09 2017
